question.title: Spring cloud stream with Java 11
question.body:
I am trying to use spring cloud stream with kinesis binder for my java 11 app, in my build.gradle i have these dependencies defined

plugins {
    id("java")
    id("org.springframework.boot") version "2.7.18"
    id("io.spring.dependency-management") version "1.1.7"
    id("com.google.protobuf") version "0.9.4"
}

 implementation("org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream:3.2.6")
 implementation("org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream-binder-kinesis:2.0.2.RELEASE")

After starting the application i am getting Caused by: java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: org/springframework/cloud/stream/function/PollableSourceInitializer has been compiled by a more recent version of the Java Runtime (class file version 61.0), this version of the Java Runtime only recognizes class file versions up to 55.0

Is it possible to fix this or java 11 is not at all supported?

Gradle dependencies

|    +--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream:2.2.1.RELEASE -> 3.0.13.RELEASE
+--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream-binder-kinesis:1.2.1.RELEASE
|    +--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream:2.2.1.RELEASE -> 3.0.13.RELEASE
+--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream-binder-kinesis:1.2.1.RELEASE (n)
+--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream-binder-kinesis:1.2.1.RELEASE
|    +--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream:2.2.1.RELEASE -> 3.0.13.RELEASE
+--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream-binder-kinesis:1.2.1.RELEASE
|    +--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream:2.2.1.RELEASE -> 3.0.13.RELEASE
+--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream-binder-kinesis:1.2.1.RELEASE
|    +--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream:2.2.1.RELEASE -> 3.0.13.RELEASE
+--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream-binder-kinesis:1.2.1.RELEASE
|    +--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream:2.2.1.RELEASE -> 3.0.13.RELEASE
+--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream-binder-kinesis:1.2.1.RELEASE
|    +--- org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream:2.2.1.RELEASE -> 3.0.13.RELEASE

answers.body:
That class was introduced in 4.0.1 version of Spring Cloud Stream: https://github.com/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-stream/commit/3318e14c60a27bd98944db9ce32c49a795d307c8.

That means that your implementation("org.springframework.cloud:spring-cloud-stream:3.2.6") is somehow out of use because there is something overriding the Spring Cloud Stream version.

Run gradlew dependencies to see what really brings you a newer Spring Cloud Stream version.

79652957.body: thanks after cleanup and gradle cache delete, everything is working fine. Thanks a lot for help

Thanks. I see. But that still does not reflect whatever you show as your dependencies. You can try with -verbose:class to see the class origin: stackoverflow.com/questions/10230279/java-verbose-class-load‌​ing. And search for that PollableSourceInitializer.
Thanks added the output from gradlew dependencies | grep 'cloud-stream' did not see any 4.0 version being pulled
